title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 23
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 23
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl J Riccadonna Chief U.S. Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Why U.S. stocks can rise as Treasury-yield gaps narrow." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
